18-39) 1 (Single) or 2 (Family) designated individuals One-time initial contribution: $1500 (plus tax) Single monthly dues: $260 (plus tax) Family monthly dues: $325 (plus tax) Complimentary greens fees** Full access to all aspects of the Golf Course &Club Member-only access to Clubster App Introductory Membership (6 month membership) 1 (Single) or 2 (Family) designated individuals One-time initial contribution: $750 (plus tax) Single monthly dues: $205 (plus tax) Family monthly dues: $285 (plus tax) Complimentary greens fees Sunday –Wednesday** Member-only access to Clubster App Corporate Membership 4 associates of registered local companies and professional associations One-time initial contribution: $5500 (plus tax) Monthly dues: $485 (plus tax) Complimentary greens fees** Full access to all aspects of the Golf Course &Club Member-only access to Clubster App Military Train ing Membership Initiation Fee: $500 (plus tax) Monthly dues: $150 (plus tax) Complimentary greens fees** Full access to all aspects of the Golf Course/Club; Member-only access to Clubster App Offering subject to change without notice. **Member cart fee is $24.00 plus tax for 18 holes, $12.00 for 9 holes. Walking is permitted at discretion of manager before 1:00 p.m. Private cart fee is $125.00 monthly. Bag storage and locker fees are $120.00 each per year. Billing occurs on the first of the month for prior months dues and charges. There is a quarterly F&B minimum of $150.00 for regular members, $75.00 for Transfer members. Members are required to sign for charges to their account and must have a credit card on file whether they pay by credit card or not. Monthly charges paid by credit/debit card are subject to a $10 monthly charge. All payments are subject to Florida sales tax of 7.5%. Transferable memberships have the same Initiation Fees as the Single and Family. Contact: Ricky White Membership Director Rwhite @lostkeygolf.com Office 850.549.2165 GHIN Service Our Premier membership opportunities are for seasoned players or those just starting out. We have Single, Family or Transferable memberships for individuals who have a vacation home and choose to rent their home when not in town. Additionally, we have Corporate Memberships for local businesses looking to expand their network with like-minded professionals who share a passion for the game of Golf and all of the benefits of being a Member. All of the current Memberships are available to non-residents of Lost Key and the general public. Members enjoy the following privileges: Advanced fourteen-day preferred tee times Use of locker rooms with showers/bathrooms with television and game table Complimentary handicapping system Complimentary charging privileges Complimentary greens fees Preferred pricing on golf shop merchandise,  15% off Apparel, Head-wear and Footwear Preferred rate for member accompanied guests Unlimited use of members-only practice range facility with unlimited range balls Ability to utilize facility for corporate meetings and events Access to member/guest and member club events Please enable JavaScript in your browser to complete this form. Framed by the natural beauty of Perdido Key, Lost Key is ideally located between historic downtown Pensacola and the pristine sugar sand beaches of Orange Beach and Gulf Shores. Redesigned by the Arnold Palmer Design Group in 2006, the par 71 signature designed championship course features the new Sea Dwarf Paspalum grass from the tee through the green for the optimum in quality playing surfaces and green speeds. Each golf hole includes five sets of tees, and offers players of all skill levels a unique visual and strategic playing experience. Lost Key was the first golf course in the State of Florida to be certified as an Audubon International Silver Signature Sanctuary. The project continues to protect the natural resources of the area while providing an outstanding golf experience. Our new state of the art golf clubhouse features a full service golf shop, men’s and ladies locker room facilities with lounge areas, and a restaurant and bar with indoor and outdoor seating and panoramic views of the golf course. Lost Key Golf Club provides all the amenities and quality service of the finest private clubs, yet is open to non-Members and resort guests. Lost Key welcomes golf outings of all sizes and our clubhouse is available for private social events. Contact Information Lost Key Golf Club 625 Lost Key Drive Pensacola, FL 32507 (850) 549-2160 www.lostkeygolf.com info@lostkeygolf.com General General ADA Compliant Food/Beverage Service Parking Golf Amenities Golf Amenities Advance Tee Times Chipping Area Clubhouse Driving Range Golf Cart Rental Golf Lessons Golf Packages Practice Greens Pro Shop Public Course Year Renovated: 2006 Championship Par: 71 Championship Rating: 72 Championship Slope: 144 Championship Yardage: 6801 Mens Par: 71 Mens Rating: 72 Mens Slope: 144 Mens Yardage: 6801 Womens Par: 71 Womens Rating: 68 Womens Slope: 121 Womens Yardage: 4807 Restaurant Amenities Restaurant Amenities Seating Capacity: 80 Brunch Dinner Full Bar Group Seating Available Lunch Outdoor Dining Private Dining Room Take Out Wine/Beer Breakfast Meeting Space Meeting Space Largest Room: 1500 sq. ft. Golf Outings - Lost Key Golf Club Skip to main content Skip to primary sidebar Lost Key Golf Club Home Golf About Us Book a Tee Time Golf Rates Ladies 9 & Wine Specials Golf Course Architect Course Tour Golf Shop Guest Information Membership Outings & Events Outings & Events Golf Outings Corporate Events Weddings & Social Events Request Information Social Events Calendar Grille 625 at Lost Key Golf Club Breakfast Menu Lunch Menu Brunch Menu Grill 625 on DoorDash Contact Location & Directions Hours Hotel Accommodations Golf Outings The lush setting of Lost Key Golf Club and Grille 625 makes it the perfect choice for golf events, tournaments and social receptions of all sizes. U.S Open Qualifier was held here on April 24th, 2024! Come and see why they chose to play here! Close attention to detail by our professional golf and food and beverage staff allows everyone, including the tournament chairperson, to participate in the excitement of the event activities. Planning a group event is as convenient as determining the number of players, selecting a date and making a phone call to our knowledgeable staff. Schedule your golf event and prepare yourself for accolades resulting from a job well done. Both tee time and shotgun start golf events are offered. A variety of tournament formats include: Individual gross and net scoring, scramble, best ball and skins game format. Our practice facility is fully equipped with a driving range, practice green and green side bunker. A variety of tournament competitions include: Long drive, closest to the pin, hole in one, and longest putt. At Grille 625, our food and beverage staff will accommodate all your needs whether it be a boxed lunch, BBQ buffet, awards reception, breakfast, lunch, dinner and beverage cart service. Winter Hours 8:00am – 4:00pm. ATM in Lobby open 7:30am-4:30pm. For more information on hosting your outing or event at Lost Key Golf Club, please call (850) 549-2160 or email Ricky White at rwhite@lostkeygolf.com . Golf Outing Calendar 35 events found. From board meetings to team-building seminars, client golf outings, holiday parties, and leadership forums Lost Key Golf Club specializes in creating memorable events and carries an array of meeting venues. Executives will find Lost Key Golf Club and Grille 625, an especially impressive venue for business meetings or entertaining. For more information on hosting your outing or event at Lost Key Golf Club, please call (850) 549-2160 or email Mandy Nelson, mnelson@lostkeygolf.com .
